articles.description: SII is manufacturing 50-60 million doses of Covishield a month and will increase its capacity to 100 million doses by March after commissioning its third plant.
articles.content: AstraZeneca Plc will soon release data showing that the effectiveness of its covid-19 vaccine rises to as much as 95% if the two shots are separated by about 2-3 months, said Adar Poonawalla, chief e… [+3356 chars]

articles.author: Ian Hughes
articles.title: Final lorries to leave Kent for France after thousands stuck on M20 for Christmas - Kent Live
articles.description: As of Monday a total of 14,659 HGVs had departed via the Port of Dover and the Eurotunnel since their reopening
articles.content:
The last lorry drivers who were stuck in their vehicles in Kent over the Christmas period are preparing to cross to France.
